BackstoryDef.title: stormtrooper
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as a rifleman in the Imperial infantry, deployed to outer rim colonies and insurrection zones. The armor was stifling, the rations synthetic, and the orders clear: hold the perimeter - show no hesitation. \n[PAWN_pronoun] rarely saw officers, only heard their voices through distorted comms. What mattered was formation, fire discipline, and fear. Above all, fear.

BackstoryDef.title: stormtrooper
BackstoryDef.description: Trained for discipline, precision, and unquestioning loyalty, [PAWN_nameDef] served the Empire as a stormtrooper rifleman. \nDeployed to outer sectors, [PAWN_pronoun] enforced peace and order through patrols, precision engagements, and public demonstrations of Imperial strength. Civilian unrest was suppressed swiftly. Morale remained high. \nService record notes: “Reliable under pressure. No hesitation in crowd control or small arms suppression.”

BackstoryDef.title: army trooper
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was recruited from a compliant world, completed initial induction at a drop camp specializing in terrain adaptation and blaster drills. \nFollowing deployment, [PAWN_pronoun] served in a planetary garrison detachment, securing territory already brought under Imperial control. \nCombat proficiency was rated sufficient. Morale remained within acceptable range. Not flagged for stormtrooper transfer.
